storyInfo: Laios's party sets out to find Goldglitter Originium slugs, all to grant the wishes of some factory workers who want to eat golden carrot as their last meal together.

attributes.content: *huff*... *huff*...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Humming)
attributes.name: Marcille
Chilchuck
attributes.content: I don't see anyone out here in the wilds. How much longer are we gonna have to walk—hey, why do you look like you're having so much fun?

attributes.name: Chilchuck
attributes.content: Hey, you're being way too chipper about all this.
attributes.joined: I don't see anyone out here in the wilds. How much longer are we gonna have to walk—hey, why do you look like you're having so much fun? Hey, you're being way too chipper about all this.

attributes.content: (Humming) That's because I managed to get one of this world's magical items!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Sure, but it's just some trash no one else wanted.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmph, don't tell me you wouldn't be happy-as-can-be if you found a new type of lockpick?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Ever since coming to this world, I've found it difficult to use my own magic. Instead, there is a unknown form of magic here that I can't use.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But now, I have this D32 Steel flashlight!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The factory owner said this 'D32 Steel' can withstand incredible amounts of energy, and that local mages use it to make magical items. Maybe I could use it to channel my magic better!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I even saw him use it to fire off something like a flash spell!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I still believe that nothing in this world comes without a price.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Maybe he didn't want to let a perfectly good tool go to waste, so he gave it to an amazing mage like me, heh heh.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'm so hyped up about the principles behind this world's magic now.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Well, why not get in some practice? How about using it to get the fruit down from that tree over there?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It's rare to see fruit trees here, and there's a few by the water. We might not get another chance.
attributes.name: Laios
Marcille
attributes.content: You just want to taste the fruit…

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: But fine. Just for practice. I'll give it a go.
attributes.joined: You just want to taste the fruit… But fine. Just for practice. I'll give it a go.

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hyah...!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: A moment of silence.
Nothing's happening.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: B-But how?! The factory owner could use it just fine, and I can feel it responding to me!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Maybe you're imagining things.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmph! I'll give it another go!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Grrrrrrhhhhhhhh...!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Yet another moment of silence.
Still nothing.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Can you really get this 'flashlight' thing to work, Marcille?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Why not go back to using your staff?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I just need to get used to it! Give me a moment and I'll understand how it works.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *Deep breath*
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Oh! You did it!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille, I knew you could—eh?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Why'd you blow yourself up?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough* *cough*! *cough* *cough* *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Look, no need to push yourself...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Why... Why does magic come out of the end?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Why are this world's magic items so hard to use?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: This is why I hate magic.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: That's different! *cough* *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: One more time! This time I'll get it right, for sure!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Excuse me! I think this D32 flashlight has some issues—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: No way! I gave you my most prized flashlight for free, and now you're back complaining about it?
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Ahem... No, I'm not! I just want to ask if you happen to sell any books that explain how it works? I'd like to study it if I could...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: No. What kind of place do you think we are? We're a factory on its last legs. We don't have anything but the weapons and mining machines!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: If you don't want it, then give it back! Hmph. I knew it. No one can truly understand the beauty of it. You can even use it to light up the entire night sky!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Nobody appreciates this sort of handy gadget... They don't sell at all... And now my factory's about to go out of business... I thought I finally met someone with good taste...
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: I-I didn't mean it that way! It's fine, it's fine, I'll just give it another shot once I've done more research on this world's magical principles! Uh, I mean... Thank you for the gift!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We should get back to our search for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: *sigh* Into that wasteland again? This world's way too big. It'll be exhausting if we walk there.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Hmm... I don't think I've seen any carriages, but...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Excuse me, this, uh...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Truck?
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Oh, so it's called a 'truck'... How much does one cost?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hah! My factory might be going bust, but this truck's still worth a pretty penny. I don't think you could afford one.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I really doubt we could reach Rhodes Island by walking all the way there...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Here, boss. Lunch.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Boss, we're nearly bankrupt. You should sell whatever we have left, otherwise I'm worried about us getting our wages.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: We've been eating carrot rice balls for yonks now! You said we'd have roast golden carrots for our farewell party today, to strive for a better tomorrow!
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Look, I know I need money to feed you guys, but if I sell off that truck, I'll have nothing to my name!
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: Alright, you all, we're about to start prepping for our party, so I'll leave you to your business.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: A farewell party?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: *sigh* It's not like there's anything to prep. All we have are carrots and rice.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: The very first meal we had when this place opened was golden carrots...
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: If I had any golden carrots to give you, I'd give them. But right now...
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: If I could, I'd love to continue the tradition. If I could.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: So it's a tradition for you to eat golden carrots here?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: We'd always have a golden carrot dish for our get-together meals.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: But looks like we have to give up on the idea today. Seriously, where are we gonna find any? I suppose barbecue and carrot rice will have to do for the party.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: Mind if I have a look at your ingredients?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Just this basket of carrots and that meat over there.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: What're you doing?
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: I understand the situation here now.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Leave the ingredients to me, will ya?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: When I'm done cooking, you'll be able to say your goodbyes with a smile.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: (Whispers) What's on his mind?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Whispers) Did you forget? Senshi joined us because he couldn't stand watching Laios cook.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: (Whispers) Probably. He just can't stand the thought of someone having a sloppy meal.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Eating's not just for survival. It's got emotional value, too. I understand that.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I'll help you get some of those golden carrots.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: You've got plenty of regular carrots, and I can certainly do something with those. But what's a golden carrot exactly?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Is it just... a gold-colored carrot?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: You lot aren't Rim Billitonians, are you?
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Golden carrots are a traditional delicacy around these parts. Ore and carrots, Rim Billiton's two specialties!
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: You eat ore? How do you cook it?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Eat ore? No no no! The gold dust on golden carrots comes from the secretions of Goldglitter Originium slugs. That kinda thing is just outta our price range.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: But if you could find some Goldglitters, we'd be able to make some right now, no problem.
attributes.name: Worker B

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Where do these slugs live?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: In mines, out in the wilds, anywhere there's not a lot of people.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: See that pit over there? Definitely got a slug nest in it, and the mine there's got two more. That tunnel further ahead is overgrown with grass, which means it's already abandoned by the slugs.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Most of the local Goldglitters get snatched up by trappers, though. Bet it'd be hard to find one.
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: Huh...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Well, the factory might be shutting down, but I still haven't finished all my work for the day. If you lot can find some Goldglitters, we'd never forget!
attributes.name: Worker A

attributes.content: (Whispers) I am a bit hungry, but we should do something about getting to Rhodes Island, right?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: If we do manage to get these golden carrots, would you mind selling us your truck at a discount?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I... I'll consider it.
attributes.name: Factory Owner

attributes.content: There must be slugs around here. I can hear them crawling around!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Whoa... There's loads of them!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: How're we supposed to find a Goldglitter in this crowd?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Only Big Bob can calm them down. We've seen it, their attacks hurt like heck, so I don't think it'll be easy to get their secretions or whatever...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Looks like we've got no choice but to fight.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Stand back! I'll try using the magic item again. I'm definitely getting it right this time!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Marcille lifts the D32 flashlight, shuts her eyes tight, and tries her best to sense the energy stored within.
She blew herself up last time. Can she really make it work?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: No, stop!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: —What is it now?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Senshi's interruption does nothing to stop the flashlight. In fact, it begins to grow even brighter.
Don't kill them all at once, Marcille! You have to take them out one by one—
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I think we've got a bigger problem than that now, Senshi.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Marcille's thingy looks like it's about to—
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Marcille begins to glow with a dazzling light, her hair fluttering with power.
Gah! My eyes!
attributes.name: Laios & Chilchuck

attributes.content: Wha-What's happening?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I think the slugs noticed us!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I see them... B-But I still can't control this thingy very well...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Calm down, Marcille. Try it again. It might work.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Feel the flow of mana being drawn in from all around. Channel that power through my fingertips and into the tool, then release—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Studying and using magic requires one to surpass their limits of focus, preciseness, and sincerity, over and over again.
But what one truly requires is an understanding, acceptance, and awareness of the philosophy of magic!
Right at this moment, Marcille's curiosity for the magic of this world has allowed her to create a miracle—
It worked?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It worked... right?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Cautiously stop)
attributes.name: Originium Slugs

attributes.content: I'm not too sure. It's like I managed to release something, but it disappeared.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: But I can still sense it... Stay on your toes!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: It looks way more powerful than I expected!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: IT'S ABOUT TO EXPLODE!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: They run behind a rock, huddling tight as they cower behind it, praying that it will hold against the blast.
After an eternity of waiting, a foreboding sound begins to rise from beneath the ground.
The earth creaks and groans.
What kind of sound was that...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: (Carefully back away)
attributes.name: Originium Slugs

attributes.content: I don't think any of those are Goldglitter slugs, though.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: How about we get out of here first and look someplace else?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I feel like the soil's loosened up a bit.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Yeah, I also heard something break beneath us. Could it be Marcille's magic that went below our fee—
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: —eeetAHHHHHHHHH—
attributes.name: Chilchuck
